entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: Brand new year, brand new blog!

entry.title: The Singapore Math Model and Data Modeling with NamedTuples
entry.content: I learnt this week that besides the ban on chewing gum, our world famous airport and year-round summer weather, Singapore has another iconic international “export” called the Singapore Math Model.
entry.summary: I learnt this week that besides the ban on chewing gum, our world famous airport and year-round summer weather, Singapore has another iconic international “export” called the Singapore Math Model.

entry.title: Using the @property decorator in data science projects
entry.content: The @property decorator is a simple but useful Python feature that can make your data science code easier to read and write.
entry.summary: The @property decorator is a simple but useful Python feature that can make your data science code easier to read and write.James Powell

entry.title: Why I Chose OMSCS
entry.content: I started my first semester of Georgia Tech’s Online Masters of Science in Computer Science (OMSCS) this year. In this blog, I share more about why I chose this programme and what are the steps you need to take if you are also thinking of applying.
entry.summary: I started my first semester of Georgia Tech’s Online Masters of Science in Computer Science (OMSCS) this year. In this blog, I share more about why I chose this programme and what are the steps you need to take if you are also thinking of applying.Georgia Tech's "Tech Tower"
